text: Agelak, Jisas kɨlop agak, Depid ne bɨlel bɨne okok ayɨp yuwan gek, God kal ak amjakɨlak agak. Amjakɨl, Depid God kal ak mɨgan amɨl bilet dɨl ñɨbɨl, bɨne okok kɨlop ñek ñɨŋɨlak agak. Bilet anɨb ak God wɨdɨn mɨdup adek ak lɨpal, bɨ yokɨp ma ñɨbal, bɨ God nop sɨbogep okok nep ñɨbal agak. Depid nop yuwan gek bilet dɨl ñɨŋak kesɨm anɨb ak, buk Baybol kɨl tɨkɨlak ak, nɨb ma nepɨm agak?
